RelatedSentence: BELGRADE , Serbia ( May 19 , 2014 ) Serbian authorities ordered the urgent evacuation of a town where soldiers , police and volunteers were working feverishly Monday to contain the raging Sava River before it could inundate Serbia 's main power plant .

A2: for half of Serbia and most of Belgrade
RelatedSentence: The coal - fired Nikola Tesla power plant , which supplies electricity for half of Serbia and most of Belgrade , is in the flood - hit town of Obrenovac , 16 miles upstream from the capital .
Serbian police chief Nebojsa Stefanovic ordered the town evacuated of civilians Monday because of an expected surge from the Sava .
Serbia and Bosnia are struggling with the worst flooding in southeastern Europe in more than a century .
At least 35 people have died in five days of flooding caused by torrential rain .
